title: Michael Schmitz - The 4 Last Things: Death Judgment Heaven Hell
description:
Fr. Mike Schmitz is one of the leading Catholic speakers in the Church today. Fr. Mike tackles four very difficult topics in this exceptional presentation: Death, Judgement, Heaven, and Hell. Listen to this talk and finally get the answers to the question: "What Happens When I Die?"

Following the main presentation, Lighthouse has provided a bonus from the talk Purgatory: Holy Fire by Dr. Scott Hahn. This bonus is part of the 6-CD set by Dr. Hahn titled "Answering Common Objections" (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10211970).

Filetype: MP3
Total Length: 01:06:33

http://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/store/title/the-four-last-things-death-judgment-heaven-hell" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/store/title/the-four-last-things-death-judgment-heaven-hell</a>

If you enjoy this presentation, please support Lighthouse Catholic Media, NFP, which is a 501(c)(3) Not For Profit Company that seeks to answer the call for a New Evangelization. Lighthouse Catholic Media specializes in promoting the Catholic Faith through high quality presentations on audio CDs and MP3s from many of the best Catholic speakers in both English and Spanish. You can purchase CD copies of this presentation to give to your friends and family and find many other wonderful presentations available for MP3 download at https://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/ 

You can also support Lighthouse Catholic Media and the New Evangelization by making a tax-deductible donation at https://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/donate
